headline: VAN DER STAHL SCIENTIFIC, INC. 100N PEEL TENSILE TESTER
description: Peel Tensile Tester with Visual Inspection Unit  The PPT-100V is a medical pouch package test and inspection unit.
keywords: parts tensile compression oven furnace chamber load cell grips pumps extensometers measurement
categories.lvl1: Material / Physical Testing Equipment > Other Material Test
specstable:
Manufacturer Van der Stahl Scient
Model PPT-100V
Description Peel Tensile Tester with Visual Inspection Unit
Other Information

Maximum peel strength: 100N (units N, Kgf, Lbf)
Sampling: 100 point/sec
Increments: 0.1N
Computer data interface: USB
Operating temperature: +5 to 40°C
Operating humidity range: 30-80%RH
Power consumption: 9W

Power Requirements 110 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
